channel.title: [DELTA] DELETING IP BLOCKER [rep++]
channel.description:
Hey,
U guys know how to delete that u can login from 2 ip's or more from same adress? THANKS
I would love to rep++

item.title: [DELTA] DELETING IP BLOCKER [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Yes that will be in server.java IF IT HAS BEEN ADDED.

It’s from a tutorial that uses an ArrayList to store people’s IP’s once they are online, therefore only allowing one at a time. There is a chance that your source uses something similar.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] DELETING IP BLOCKER [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @i_str_pk_i i str pk i
item.description:
@i_str_pk_i wrote:

[quote=“durial12, post:7, topic:390978”]Quote from: snpteen on July 09, 2008, 01:57:21 AM
Is it possible to make it so it allows 2 connections per IP instead of just 1?

Quote from: Yz85Racer on July 09, 2008, 02:02:59 AM
Code:

if(!connections.contains(connectingHost)) {

Replace that with:
Code: [Select]

if(connectionsFromIP(connectionHost) < 3) {

Add this method:
Code: [Select]

private int connectionsFromIP(String host) {
int occurences = 0;
for(Object i : connections.toArray()) {
if(i.toString().equals(host)) {
occurences++;
}
}
return occurences;
}[/quote]

Sorry to ask by where i add it + where i add the method?

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] DELETING IP BLOCKER [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Quote from: snpteen on July 09, 2008, 01:57:21 AM
Is it possible to make it so it allows 2 connections per IP instead of just 1?

Quote from: Yz85Racer on July 09, 2008, 02:02:59 AM
Code:

if(!connections.contains(connectingHost)) {

Replace that with:
Code: [Select]

if(connectionsFromIP(connectionHost) < 3) {

Add this method:
Code: [Select]

private int connectionsFromIP(String host) {
int occurences = 0;
for(Object i : connections.toArray()) {
if(i.toString().equals(host)) {
occurences++;
}
}
return occurences;
}

Read full topic
